Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements about data binding are true and which are false?

Options.Option: Data binding helps in retrieving and updating records of a table.
Simple data binding supports binding to multiple records.
Complex data binding supports binding to a single element.
The <font face="courier new">TextBox</font> control allows only simple data binding.
The <font face="courier new">ListBox</font> control supports complex data binding.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(True), (B)-(False), (C)-(False), (D)-(True), and (E)-(True).
